author: Julie Bykowicz
title: Trump Discloses Reimbursement to Michael Cohen Tied to Stormy Daniels Payment
text:
President Donald Trumpâ€™s newly filed financial disclosure notes a payment connected to an adult-film actress who alleged a relationship with him more than a decade ago.
The payment is documented as a reimbursement to attorney Michael Cohen of between $100,001 and $250,000 for expenses in 2016.
